text:
what is the purpose of the AbstractDOMTransformer? how does it differ from the
one in cocoon?
creator: gregor@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text: it is only used in IncludeTransformer

i diffed it against the one from cocoon. the only real difference is
setNormalizeNamespaces(false); being set in the lenya one. looks like a stupid
workaround to me.
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
We could change the references to the Cocoon A.D.Transformer in 1.4 and see if
any problems occur.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: fixed. let's keep an eye out on this.
creator: gregor@apache.org
edith@apache.org
text:
With the new xalan (cocoon-1.2.6), the setNormalizeNamespaces(false); induces
problems. The lenya's AbstractDOMTransformer is no more needed.
